item.description:
Before signing up for this event, Please read the entire Write Up and understand and agree to the enclosed Liability Waiver.

Event Rating: Difficult

Distance:6.5 to 7 MILES

Time Duration 2.5 t0 3 hours

Blaze Orange not required

If you have not not  completed a moderate to fast  pace hike at least  5 miles plus  . Please do not sigh up for this hike.

Hi Everyone ,   I am sure most of you have been on this trail before and  it is a group favorite  .This is one of the nicer hikes we do with a great finish through the gorge. We are  going to add Yawgoog Pond to the mix .We will hike at a moderate to fast  pace . The hike is around  6 to 7  miles and should take 2 1/2 to 3  plus hours  . The mileage might actually be a little longer .The trail will lead us around the West side of  Yawgoog Pond  . Then North by the  ledges , old mill ruins and eventually into Connecticut around Green Falls Pond .The waterfalls and  the  the gorge are next as we had south .We will then return down an dirt road for about  1 1/2  to 2 miles back to the parking lot . Unfortunately I am sure the water level will be  low so the waterfalls might only be a trickle  but still will be a very nice hike .   Good foot ware is required and we will  hike   at a moderate to fast   pace . Please bring plenty of water , food and insect repellent . Please wear blaze orange for safety ..

See you Saturday ,

Tony
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the paved road up to the entrance of Yawgoog Scout Camp then take a right on the gravel road. Look for Tony at the large parking lot

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Narragagansett Trail and Yawgoog Pond
